shortContent:
It
counts as being armed even when not wielding weapons. Its
attacks deal 1d10 points of damage plus its Strength Bonus.
The creature may make attacks with its Natural Weapons
using its Weapon Skill, though it cannot parry with its natural
weapons, nor can it be disarmed. Natural weapons always count as Primitive.
content:
This creature has sharp claws, teeth, spines or some other
natural weapon with which it can slice and dice its foes. It
counts as being armed even when not wielding weapons. Its
attacks deal 1d10 points of damage plus its Strength Bonus.
The creature may make attacks with its Natural Weapons
using its Weapon Skill, though it cannot parry with its natural
weapons, nor can it be disarmed—unless, of course, you hack
off its limbs! Natural weapons always count as Primitive.
